ops.raw: d0 5d fa 4a 09 e1 03 42 fa ec 08 df 03

ops.js: fade({r:80, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:40, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:5, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // “Mako energy puts a lot of wear and tear
on the machinery.”{PAUSE}“A lot of problems can pop up.
So it's necessary for close inspections
and maintenance.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // “What is it?
The elevator's out of order
for an inspection.”{PAUSE}“You know, right under us
is a {CYAN}Submarine Dock{WHITE}
and the {CYAN}Underwater Mako Reactor{WHITE}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // “Our forces are in the process of gathering
the Huge Materia from the Corel and the
Fort Condor Reactors!”{PAUSE}“Once these two missions are completed,
the Underwater Reactor will be
our next target!”{PAUSE}“Till then, we do nothing but train, train, train!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // “Go around them!
And stay out of their way!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // “Hey!! Civilian!!
Stay out of our training!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // “All right!!
Let's see how hard you trained!”

dialogStrings:
“What is it?
The elevator's out of order
for an inspection.”{PAUSE}“You know, right under us
is a {CYAN}Submarine Dock{WHITE}
and the {CYAN}Underwater Mako Reactor{WHITE}.”

“Mako energy puts a lot of wear and tear
on the machinery.”{PAUSE}“A lot of problems can pop up.
So it's necessary for close inspections
and maintenance.”

“Hey!! Civilian!!
Stay out of our training!!”

“Go around them!
And stay out of their way!!”

“All right!!
Let's see how hard you trained!”

“He…hey!!
That's the Underwater Reactor!!
Come back!!”

“Our forces are in the process of gathering
the Huge Materia from the Corel and the
Fort Condor Reactors!”{PAUSE}“Once these two missions are completed,
the Underwater Reactor will be
our next target!”{PAUSE}“Till then, we do nothing but train, train, train!”
